title: abhayAmbikAyAha anyam na jAnE
sahitya:
P:  abhayAmbikAyAha anyam na jAnE ajnAnadhmAnE aparOkSa jnAnE A:  ibharAjagatyAha IshvaryAha jagatyAha nabhOmaNi gatyAha nAdalayagatyAha caraNam    bAlAdi nAmadhEya prakAshinyAha kAlAdI tatvAnta prakAshinyAha
mUlAdi dvAdashAnta prakAshinyAha sthUlAdi maunAnta prakAshinyAha
trailOkya mUlA prakrtyAha svashaktyAha sAlOka sAmIpya sArUpya muktyAha
mAlinImantra mAlAdi tantrOktyAh shUlinI guruguha svAnubhava gatyAh
